effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
